channel.title: Why do most European's hate Americans?
channel.description:
I never knew why.
Whenever I ask it I get a "fuck you faggot American you fat cheeseburger eating idiot"
So yea, why?

item.title: Why do most European's hate Americans?

@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

lol i think hes asking if they hate people from usa not the cotinent of north america

item.title: Why do most European's hate Americans?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:270, topic:327435”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=423826.msg3135132#msg3135132 date=1266879297]
America is a contenent (excuse the spelling).
South and north, therefore your argument is invalid.
[/quote]
Isn’t it North and South America, not just “America”?[/quote]

Correct. America generally refers to USA though

Read full topic

item.title: Why do most European's hate Americans?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:268, topic:327435”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=423826.msg3135748#msg3135748 date=1266952430]

Jamie, please learn some geography…

I believe before you said Mexico was part of the United States as well…

I think you need to learn Geography as well…

Why?

Everything I said was true…

When I said “Europe is a continent?” it was because Niall was comparing all of Europe to just the United States. It’s rather retarded that you didn’t pick up on that…

Same to xweetok599
[/quote]

Europe is pretty much the same size as the USA, though. The UK alone is minuscule compared to the size of America.[/quote]
No one said anything about land area or population density though.

Read full topic

item.source: Why do most European's hate Americans?

item.title: Why do most European's hate Americans?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:258, topic:327435”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=423826.msg3134967#msg3134967 date=1266871123]

Europe is a continent?

Well done!

I only pointed it out because Niall was saying how Europe has so many more people than the USA, when the point is that Europe is an entire continent, not just one country. Don’t be an ass.
[/quote]

That some how makes my point invalid?

But really, what is the problem with British people?

I dont have a problem with them, the only problem i have with them is completely true and that is that they view America in stupid ways because they’re ignorant also. Im not saying the US isnt at all, every country has its retards and smart people. Around 50M brits, and 400M Americans, whos really going to have more?

Haven’t we already been through this before?

Europe > USA in population

Ive never met an Italian, German or anyone else that hates us other than people in the Uk.

And as David said, the US is one country and Europe is made up of many small countries. So we could pick on the Uk but there could possibly others that hate us also.

See above ^[/quote]
Yes, because he was only talking about Britain.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do most European's hate Americans?

item.description:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:256, topic:327435”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=423826.msg3134962#msg3134962 date=1266870887]

Europe is a continent?

Well done!
[/quote]
I only pointed it out because Niall was saying how Europe has so many more people than the USA, when the point is that Europe is an entire continent, not just one country. Don’t be an ass.[/quote]

That some how makes my point invalid?

[quote=“Frell, post:257, topic:327435”][quote author=Niall link=topic=423826.msg3134944#msg3134944 date=1266868525]

But really, what is the problem with British people?

I dont have a problem with them, the only problem i have with them is completely true and that is that they view America in stupid ways because they’re ignorant also. Im not saying the US isnt at all, every country has its retards and smart people. Around 50M brits, and 400M Americans, whos really going to have more?

Haven’t we already been through this before?

Europe > USA in population
[/quote]
Ive never met an Italian, German or anyone else that hates us other than people in the Uk.

And as David said, the US is one country and Europe is made up of many small countries. So we could pick on the Uk but there could possibly others that hate us also.[/quote]

See above ^

Read full topic

item.title: Why do most European's hate Americans?
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

I only talk shit to brits on xbox live when they won’t shut the fuck up, or they’re trying to talk shit to me. I’ve never met someone from britain so I really have no reference other than stereotypes. My school did have an austrailian basketball team play ours when they were touring california. They were pretty cool, they had to stay at our player’s houses, and they kept talking about how rich we were, having “six cars, and 7 T.V.'s, all you guys live in MONSIONS”. I lol’d at the kid.

Read full topic
